product_name: Revelate Designs Tangle Bike Frame Bag - Small
long_description: Offering extra space below your top tube for bikepacking, commutes and everyday rides, the small Revelate Tangle Bag features a 3.5-liter capacity and tough, water-resistant construction.
short_description: Offering extra space below your top tube for bikepacking, commutes and everyday rides, the small Revelate Tangle Bag features a 3.5-liter capacity and tough, water-resistant construction.
